EmailTemplate.textOnly:
January 22, 2015
Dear Honeywell Customer,
Honeywell continues to evaluate every opportunity to evolve our business processes and technologies to increase operational efficiency and improve performance.
What this means to you.
Customers should continue to utilize Honeywellâ€™s electronic interfaces such as EDI, Winshuttle or the MyAerospace portal.
New mailboxes have been created to route customer inquiries to the appropriate CSR team for processing. Starting today, customers may begin using the following mailbox addresses.
- OEM/Spares Orders orders@honeywell.com <mailto:orders@honeywell.com>
- Placing a new Honeywell Spares or OEM PO order
- Requesting status or changing an existing Honeywell order
- OEM/Spares Quotes quotes@honeywell.com <mailto:quotes@honeywell.com>
- Requesting a Spares or OEM quote for pricing and availability .
- Repair & Overhaul aerorepairs@honeywell.com <mailto:aerorepairs@honeywell.com>
- Any repair related issue, order or quote question, status, or purchase order information related to a repair unit.
- Repair & Overhaul Quote Approvals cpsquotesapprovals@honeywell.com <mailto:cpsquotesapprovals@honeywell.com>
- Customer approving or rejecting quotes for repair, scrap, Return As Is (RAI), test and overhaul.
Another option available to Customers is the 24/7 myAerospace <http://www.myaerospace.com/> portal to check unit status, product availability, pricing and order placement.
Yours Sincerely,
Honeywell Aerospace
